reviewText:
Colorful, sweet and very kind game
The setting is very unusual for the action rpg and it's cool!
Gameplay is smooth and funny. 10 out of 10 wolves thrown into the faces
At all it's not a bad choice for a couple of nights for the price
voteText: 11 of 20 people (55%) found this review helpful 1 person found this review funny

reviewText:
3rd person adventure fighting game.

The graphics are bright and pretty.
The voice acting is pretty much what you can expect in an indie game, but not bad.
Music is fine as well.

All in all a good quality game for a very reasonable price.
voteText: 3 of 5 people (60%) found this review helpful

reviewText: I am enjoying this game so far. Graphics are interesting, and controls take a lil to get used to. But I will edit this review when I get more time in it.

reviewText: Decent graphics and cool physics but the voice acting is very awkward.  Everyone seems like they have their own unique accent.  The cutscenes are slow and boring.  The combat has potential, but this is no Witcher (but there's worse for $3)
voteText: 2 of 15 people (13%) found this review helpful

reviewText: The gameplay and graphics are ok so far.  Nothing mind blowing but they paint a nice picture of the world, also like the cell shaded character designs.\n\nBut I'm constantly sucekd out of the world and the story by the TERRIBLE translations.  I think google translate could do better than this.  This game clearly wasn't made for english speaekrs which is a shame because its not a bad action rpg
